|brand = Askey |model = WLU5053 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -D4 (RoHS) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 4, 2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Askey_WLU5053 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = module
|vendor_id = 0930 |device_id = 0a0b |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = H8N-WLU5053 |icid = 1353A-WLU5053 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = C0:D9:62, E0:CE:C3
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1234 P21, 227424 6 W; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/04/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module would appear to be for certain '''Toshiba''' HDTVs.
The data lines for this device seem to be swapped. :Green = Data +, White = Data -
This device does work with '''brcmfmac''', to some extent (5 GHz channels don't work), after the device ID is added at runtime <small>(modprobe brcmfmac; echo "0930 0a0b" > /sys/bus/usb/drivers/brcmfmac/new_id;)</small>.
==Notes== {{/Info dump}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
